           <a href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/is-it-time-to-end-the-farce-of-hereditary-peers-in-the-house-of-lords-k62q30zq6">
            investigation
           </a>
           has found that the hereditaries cost the taxpayer more and contribute less than...

          <div class="ArticleLabel-container">
           <p class="ArticleLabel Item-articleLabel u-themeColor">
            BRONWEN MADDOX
           </p>
          </div>
          <h3 class="Item-headline Headline--l">
           <a class="js-tracking" data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:i applaud the hereditary peers for their stroppiness but it doesnt earn them the right to stay","section_details":"section:comment"}' href="/article/i-applaud-the-hereditary-peers-for-their-stroppiness-but-it-doesnt-earn-them-the-right-to-stay-l3kplqrsg">
            I applaud the hereditary peers for their stroppiness but it doesnt earn them the right to stay
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="Dip Item-dip">
           <span class="u-showOnWide">
            It is impossible to defend the principle that some members of the House of Lords hold their seats by virtue
            <a href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/revealed-the-truth-about-the-house-of-lords-peers-who-are-born-to-rule-nbdvcfrv3" target="_blank">
             only of their birth
            </a>
             and gender. It looked indefensible in a modern democracy almost a quarter of a century ago when Tony Blair tried to...
           </span>
           <span class="u-showOnMedium">
            It is impossible to defend the principle that some members of the House of Lords hold their seats...
           </span>
           <span class="u-showOnSmall">
            It is impossible to defend the principle that some members of the House of Lords hold their seats...
           </span>
          </p>

           Read the full story
          </a>
          <span class="Item-rule u-themeBackgroundColor">
          </span>
         </div>

          <h3 class="Item-headline Headline--l">
           <a class="js-tracking" data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:vso cuts are right: ive seen the harm aid can do","section_details":"section:comment"}' href="/article/letters-to-the-editor-ive-seen-the-harm-aid-can-do-rn7g96cpl">
            VSO cuts are right: Ive seen the harm aid can do
           </a>

          <p class="Dip Item-dip">
           <span class="u-showOnWide">
            You report drastic cuts to Voluntary Service Overseas (VSO) as part of the reduction in the foreign aid budget (
            <a href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/vso-to-wind-down-uk-operations-after-government-slashes-budget-cxvb5k5wj" target="_blank">
             News
            </a>
            , last week). I worked through VSO in a hospital in west Africa for three years and became aware that local governments...
           </span>
           <span class="u-showOnMedium">
            You report drastic cuts to Voluntary Service Overseas (VSO) as part of the reduction in the...
           </span>
           <span class="u-showOnSmall">
            You report drastic cuts to Voluntary Service Overseas (VSO) as part of the reduction in the...
           </span>
          </p>
          <a class="Item-cta Link--primary js-tracking" data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:vso cuts are right: ive seen the harm aid can do","section_details":"section:comment"}' href="/article/letters-to-the-editor-ive-seen-the-harm-aid-can-do-rn7g96cpl">

          </a>
          <span class="Item-rule u-themeBackgroundColor">

         </div>

          <h3 class="Item-headline Headline--m">

           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="Dip Item-dip">
           <span class="u-showOnWide">
            <b>
             What it is
            </b>
            <br/>
            A 605 million fund from Montanaro Asset Management that invests in small and medium-sized companies offering products that make the world better. The yield is zero and the annual charge is 0.85 per cent.
            <b>
             What
            </b>
            ...
           </span>
           <span class="u-showOnMedium">
            <b>
             What it is
            </b>
            <br/>
            A 605 million fund from Montanaro Asset Management that invests in small and medium-sized companies offering products that make the world better. The yield is zero and the annual charge is 0.85 per cent.
            <b>

           Receive our Puzzles newsletter every Saturday
          </a>
         </h3>
         <a class="js-tracking" data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:puff:article title","article_parent_name":"article:receive our puzzles newsletter every saturday"}' href="https://home.thetimes.co.uk/myNews">
          <p class="Strapline Strapline--puff PuffItem-strapline Strapline--puffFull">
           Includes competitions, the best from the weeks crosswords and quizzes, latest news and more
          </p>
         </a>
         <div class="PuffItem-footer">
          <a class="Link--primary PuffItem-cta js-tracking js-scrollTo" data-link-target="https://home.thetimes.co.uk/myNews" data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:puff:section","section_details":"section:signUp"}' href="https://home.thetimes.co.uk/myNews">
           SIGN UP
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

          <h3 class="Item-headline Headline--s">
           <a class="js-tracking" data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:vegetarian indian recipes for a holi feast","section_details":"section:the sunday times magazine"}' href="/article/vegetarian-indian-recipes-for-a-holi-feast-dqz227c9m">

        <div class="Item P-1 Theme--culture">
         <div class="Item-content">
          <div class="ArticleLabel-container">
           <p class="ArticleLabel Item-articleLabel u-themeColor">
            culture noticeboard
           </p>
          </div>
          <h3 class="Item-headline Headline--l">
           <a class="js-tracking" data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:things to do in the week ahead: the best art, theatre, comedy and podcasts","section_details":"section:culture"}' href="/article/things-to-do-in-the-week-ahead-the-best-art-theatre-comedy-and-podcasts-for-the-week-ahead-bprzg22nn">
            Things to do in the week ahead: the best art, theatre, comedy and podcasts
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="Dip Item-dip">
           <span class="u-showOnWide">
            <b>
             Consent
            </b>
            <br/>
            Kitty (Claudie Blakely) and her barrister husband, Edward (Stephen Campbell Moore), are the witnesses and adjudicators of the marriage of two intimate friends, who are also barristers, in Nina Raines hideously enjoyable tragicomedy.
           </span>
           <span class="u-showOnMedium">
            <b>
             Consent
            </b>
            <br/>
            Kitty (Claudie Blakely) and her barrister husband, Edward (Stephen Campbell Moore)...
           </span>
           <span class="u-showOnSmall">
            <b>
             Consent
            </b>
            <br/>
            Kitty (Claudie Blakely) and her barrister husband, Edward (Stephen Campbell Moore)...

           <span class="u-showOnWide">
            <b>

             <br/>

            <b>

             <br/>

            </b>

            </i>

    <section class="Section Section--travel js-orientationHook" data-document-category="section" data-name="travel" data-section-identifier="89a55275-a716-4de6-8833-65f60dc269a8" data-section-name="travel" data-text="Travel" data-theme="travel" data-total="1" id="section-travel">
     <header class="Section-header Theme--travel">
      <div class="Section-headerBackground">
       <h2 class="Section-title Headline--section">

          <h3 class="Item-headline Headline--l">
           <a class="js-tracking" data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:lorimer was fearsome, loyal and a leeds legend","section_details":"section:scotland"}' href="/article/peter-lorimer-was-fearsome-loyal-and-a-leeds-united-legend-bvghzfn2q">

           </a>

          <p class="Dip Item-dip">
           <span class="u-showOnWide">
            Peter Lorimer will be remembered for the ferocity of his shot, widely considered the hardest of his era, but also the warmth of his personality. In an age when footballers are often remote figures to those who worship them from afar, Lorimer was a...
